    CM-200
    Edit on GitHub

    Compatible Softwares : Roboplus 1.0, Roboplus 2.0 Compatible Devices : Downloader LN-101, IR Sensor IRSS-10, Touch Sensor TS-10, Color Sensor CS-10, Magnetic Sensor MGSS-10, Motion Sensor PIR-10, Temperature Sensor TPS-10, Moisture Sensor TMS-10, Passive IR Sensor CDS-10, Servo Motor SM-10, Geared Motor GM-10A, Low Speed Geared Motor, LED Module LM-10, ZIG-110A, BT-110A, BT-210, BT-410, Li-ion Battery LBS-040, Battery Box ABB-030
